sentences.sentence: There is no remarkable difference between the two growth results of Chinese penaeid shrimp and wheel animalcule feeded by condensed and conserved algae and common algae .
sentences.translation: 用浓缩保存藻投喂中国对虾和轮虫的效果与普通藻无显著差异。

sentences.sentence: The result of the observation shows that cross-infection of the penaeid baculovirus and germ into penaeid cell was the main pathogeny causing the unexpected virus disease of penaeid shrimp.
sentences.translation: 结果表明，造成养殖对虾爆发性病害的主要原因是对虾杆状病毒与细菌交叉感染所致。
